categories: Category:Battles of the Second Imperial Civil War

nodes.text: Liberation of the Drash-So labor camp

The liberation of the Drash-So labor camp happened at the end of the Second Imperial Civil War, when the Empire-in-exile freed the Sith prisoners on Drash-So. Imperial Knight Teemen Alton was one of the liberators, but came to suspect that the prisoner who called herself Ania Solo was not who she seemed. Alton went in pursuit of the individual after the liberation, and was killed by her in the nearby Opoku system.
